attributes.action: MAKE JAN 31st or 23rd june a bank holiday to celebrate UK Independence Day
attributes.additional_details:
They are only ones who can.- But it should be the people who choose
 just like we chose  
B R E X I T
attributes.background: To give us a national holiday to celebrate getting rid of the eu all other countries celebrate there independence days. Yet as usual. U.K. gov do not seem to care

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/589572
